parameters.name: DisplayStateOption
parameters.description: Display states as defined in swDisplayStateOpts_e

parameters.name: DisplayStateNames
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the names of the display states to which to add material VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IModelDocExtension.IAddDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial
description: Adds the specified material to the specified display states in the active configuration and returns the IDs assigned to that material.
signature:
System.Boolean IAddDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial( 
   RenderMaterial
PRenderMaterial
,
   System.Int32
DisplayStateOption
,
   System.Int32
DisplayStateCount
,
   ref System.String
DisplayStateNames
,
   out System.Int32
PWMaterialId1
,
   out System.Int32
PWMaterialId2
)

parameters.name: DisplayStateOption
parameters.description: Display states as defined in swDisplayStateOpts_e

parameters.name: DisplayStateNames
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the names of the display states to which to add material VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

returns: True if material is added, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IConfiguration::GetDisplayStatesCount
to get DisplayStateCount.
